mapper.update:
update fop_company
departmentId = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creditCode = #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyType = #{companyType,jdbcType=CHAR},
fullName = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shortName = #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyCode = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyLogo = #{companyLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyLinkUrl = #{companyLinkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
areaCode = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyProperty = #{companyProperty,jdbcType=CHAR},
establishDate = #{establishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
crewSize = #{crewSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
registeredCapital = #{registeredCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fixedAssets = #{fixedAssets,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
workingCapital = #{workingCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ownSpace = #{ownSpace,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
tenancySpace = #{tenancySpace,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
personId = #{personId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
firstPersonId = #{firstPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
secPersonId = #{secPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
postcode = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
majorVariety = #{majorVariety,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
laborContractNum = #{laborContractNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
thirdLaborRelation = #{thirdLaborRelation,jdbcType=CHAR},
socialInsuranceAddr = #{socialInsuranceAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
socialInsuranceNum = #{socialInsuranceNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accTaxAmount = #{accTaxAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
yearTaxAmount = #{yearTaxAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
createUserId = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createUserName = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lastModifyUserId = #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastModifyUserName = #{lastModifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastModifyDate = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
belongTo = #{belongTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update fop_company set departmentId = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creditCode = #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyType = #{companyType,jdbcType=CHAR}, fullName = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shortName = #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyCode = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyLogo = #{companyLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyLinkUrl = mapper.sql: c.belongTo, porg.orgType as partyCategory, porg.establishDate as partyCrtDt, porg.peopleNum as partyPeoples, porg.dutyPersonName as partyDutyMan, porg.dutyPersonPhone as partyPhone, uorg.establishDate as unionCrtDt, uorg.dutyPersonName as unionDutyMan, uorg.dutyPersonPhone as unionPhone, a.reemployContribution, a.educationContribution, a.helpPoorContribution, a.otherContribution, c.id, c.departmentId, c.creditCode, c.companyType, c.fullName, c.shortName, c.companyCode, c.companyLogo, c.companyLinkUrl, c.areaCode, c.companyProperty, c.establishDate, c.crewSize, c.registeredCapital, c.fixedAssets, c.workingCapital, c.ownSpace, c.tenancySpace, c.personId, c.address, c.latitude, c.longitude, c.firstPersonId, c.secPersonId, c.postcode, c.fax, c.email, c.majorVariety, c.laborContractNum, c.thirdLaborRelation, c.socialInsuranceAddr, c.socialInsuranceNum, c.accTaxAmount, c.yearTaxAmount, c.remark, c.status, c.createUserId, c.createUserName, c.createDate, c.lastModifyUserId, c.lastModifyUserName, c.lastModifyDate, p.realName,pp.name as areaCodeName, p.mobileNumer AS lpMobile, p.sex AS lpSex, p.birthDate AS lpBirthDt, p.nationality as lpNationality, p.nativePlace AS lpNativePlace,p.political AS lpPolitical, p.recruitmentDate AS lpRecruitmentDate,p.education AS lpEducation,p.skillJobTitle AS lpSkillJobTitle, p.deptPost AS lpDeptPost,p.identityCard AS lpIdentityCard,p.societyPost AS lpSocietyPost, p.resume as lpResume, p.achievement as lpAchievement, z.name as companyPropertyName

from fop_company c left join fop_person p on p.id=c.personId left join portal.province pp on pp.code=c.areaCode LEFT JOIN (SELECT *FROM portal.dict where category_id='134') z on z.code=c.companyProperty left join (select companyId, orgType, establishDate, peopleNum, dutyPersonName, dutyPersonPhone from fop_company_org po where po.companyOrgType = 1 ) porg on c.id = porg.companyId left join (select companyId, establishDate, dutyPersonName, dutyPersonPhone from fop_company_org po where po.companyOrgType = 2 ) uorg on c.id = uorg.companyId LEFT JOIN (select companyId, MAX( case itemCode when '1' then itemValue else '' end) 'reemployContribution' , MAX( case itemCode when '2' then itemValue else '' end) 'educationContribution' , MAX( case itemCode when '3' then itemValue else '' end) 'helpPoorContribution' , MAX( case itemCode when '4' then itemValue else '' end) 'otherContribution' from fop_company_contribution group by companyId )a on a.companyId = c.id
mapper.select: SELECT t.role_id, t.role_name, t.create_time, t.create_user_id, t.remark, t.type, t.syid FROM portal.role t WHERE t.syid = 'fop' AND t.type IN (4)

select t.id, t.fullName from fop_company t where 0=0
and t.fullName like concat('%',#{params.q},'%')
order by t.createDate limit 0,20
